channel.title: RE: Marijuana?
channel.description:
I quote Acorn_ - "Yes because we all want people on cocaine, and meth driving around beating the fuck out of people for no reason. "
implying they don't do that already

item.title: RE: Marijuana?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

We’re glad you pointed out that particular bit of ignorance, but these topics are really starting to get old. You’ve got people on one side going “ahhh yeahhh MAKE POT LEGAL wooooh” who most obviously smoke it, and then the opposite extremists who have know conception of its properties, health risks (or partial lack thereof), or any idea of how drugs work in general who are talking it down like it’s the antichrist. Honestly, we’ve had over a dozen marijuana topics in the last year, why the fuck do we need another one? I personally don’t care if you guys smoke pot or want it legal. It’s fine if you want to discuss it, just stop arguing about it and creating new topics.

Read full topic

item.title: RE: Marijuana?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

If people want to kill themselves let them, but it is stupid to endanger others lives.

Read full topic
